rukus.text: 26|141|Samūdo (no min) mo, shito-tachi o uso-tsukidearu to shita.
26|142|Kare-ra no dōhō sārifu ga, kare-ra ni itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai. `Anata gata wa omo o osorenai nodesu ka.
26|143|Hontōni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu.
26|144|Dakara arrā o osore watashi ni shitagai nasai.
26|145|Watashi wa anata gata ni kono koto de hōshū o motomenai. Watashi e no hōshū wa, tada ban'yū no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu.
26|146|Anata gata wa koko de, itsu made mo antaide i raremashou ka.
26|148|kokumotsu hata ya, migotona waka mi o tsukeru natsumeyashi no en,
26|149|mata (iwa) yama ni, anata gataga takumi ni ie o kiri ugatte mo (antaideari eyou ka).
26|150|Dakara arrā o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.
26|151|Anata gata wa, muhōna jōkiwoisshita-sha no meirei ni, shitagatte wa narimasen.
26|152|Kare-ra wa chijō ni kigai o hikiokosu mono de,(akuhei o) kyōsei suru monode wa arimasen.'
26|153|Kare-ra wa itta. `Anata wa tsuka reta mono ni sugimasen.
26|154|Anata wa, watashi-tachi to onaji hitori no ningen ni sugimasen. Anata no iu no ga hontōnara, watashi-tachi ni shirushi o motarashi nasai.'
26|155|Kare (sārifu) wa itta. `Koko ni ittō no mesu rakuda ga imasu. Soreni mo mizunomi-bi ga ari, mata anata gata ni mo,(sorezore) kimerareta mizunomi-bi ga arimasu.
26|156|Idaina-bi no chōbatsu ga anata gata o osowanai yō, soreni gai o kuwaete wa narimasen.'
26|157|Daga kare-ra wa, sono ken o kitte fugu ni shi, tachimachi kōkai suru koto ni natta.
26|158|Sore wa chōbatsu ga kare-ra o osottakaradearu. Hontōni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no ōku wa shinjinai.
26|159|Hontōni anata no omo wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukai okata de ara reru.
